tiles.name: whispering_crags_peak
tiles.description: The highest point of the Crags, perpetually wreathed in swirling winds and often struck by lightning. A place of raw elemental power.

tiles.name: stormking_ruins_lower_slopes
tiles.description: Weathered ruins of an ancient Storm King's fortress, now inhabited only by hardy mountain goats and the echoes of forgotten rituals.

tiles.name: zephyrs_hidden_cave_entrance
tiles.description: A discreet opening on the mountainside, leading to Zephyr's secluded laboratory and library, filled with arcane knowledge and alchemical tools.

tiles.name: lightning_scarred_valley
tiles.description: A valley frequently ravaged by thunderstorms, the ground scarred with lightning strikes and the air thick with ozone.

tiles.name: altitude_research_weather_station
tiles.description: A lone weather station, manned by researchers studying the Crags' unique meteorological phenomena and the lingering magical energies.

tiles.name: crag_foothills_shepherd_outpost
tiles.description: A remote outpost used by shepherds who graze their flocks on the rugged slopes, their lives intertwined with the unpredictable weather.

tiles.name: ancient_windstone_circle
tiles.description: A circle of standing stones, believed to amplify the Crags' natural winds, used by the Storm Kings for weather manipulation.

tiles.name: ravaged_mountain_forest_edge
tiles.description: The border of a once-lush forest, now twisted and broken by the Crags' violent storms, a testament to nature's power.

tiles.name: zeriouan_hermit_order_retreat
tiles.description: The hermetic order's secluded mountain retreat, where Zephyr was raised, dedicated to studying the elemental forces of Zerioua.

tiles.name: storm_ravaged_pass
tiles.description: A mountain pass frequently blocked by landslides and blizzards, a perilous route for travelers seeking to cross the Crags.

tiles.name: foothills_river_crossing
tiles.description: A shallow river crossing that serves as a vital trade route for the small villages at the base of the Whispering Crags.

tiles.name: isolated_farming_village
tiles.description: A community of resilient farmers who have learned to coexist with the unpredictable storms and harsh conditions of the Crags' foothills.

tiles.name: lightning_struck_orchard
tiles.description: An orchard where many of the trees show burn scars from past lightning strikes, but still produce hardy, tangy fruit.

tiles.name: mountain_road_to_lower_valley
tiles.description: A winding, treacherous road that connects the Crags' heights to the more sheltered valleys below, offering stunning views and perilous turns.

tiles.name: trading_post_crossroads
tiles.description: A bustling trading post where travelers and merchants exchange goods, rumors, and tall tales of the Crags and beyond.

tiles.name: sheltered_pasture_land
tiles.description: A rare area of relatively calm pastureland, used to graze livestock during the brief periods of good weather.

tiles.name: abandoned_weather_artifact_site
tiles.description: The ruins of a research site experimenting with weather modification abandoned after a failed ritual, now said to be haunted.

tiles.name: storm_warden_shrine
tiles.description: A small shrine dedicated to appeasing the storms and winds of the Crags, adorned with talismans and offerings.

tiles.name: mineral_rich_quarry
tiles.description: A quarry where valuable minerals are extracted from the Crags' rocky heart, providing resources for alchemists and artisans alike.

tiles.name: valley_river_source
tiles.description: The source of the river that flows through the valley, fed by melting snow and the Crags' abundant rainfall.

tiles.name: foothills_rocky_outcrops
tiles.description: Rocky terrain leading up to the steeper slopes of the Whispering Crags. Sparse vegetation clings to the uneven ground.

tiles.name: abandoned_shack
tiles.description: A derelict shack, likely abandoned due to the unpredictability of the surrounding weather and dangerous wildlife. Serves as a temporary shelter for weary travelers.

tiles.name: lightning_charred_tree
tiles.description: A large, solitary tree that bears the scars of multiple lightning strikes. A stark reminder of the potent storms that rage through the region.

tiles.name: cragstone_strewn_path
tiles.description: A path almost covered over by loose stone fallen from the mountains. Only passable for sure-footed travellers.

tiles.name: hidden_medicinal_herb_patch
tiles.description: A secluded area where rare medicinal herbs grow, sheltered from the worst of the weather. Known only to local healers.

tiles.name: mountain_goat_trail
tiles.description: A narrow, precarious trail used primarily by mountain goats. Not recommended for those with a fear of heights.

tiles.name: old_stormking_watchtower_ruins
tiles.description: The crumbling remains of a watchtower once used by the Storm Kings to monitor the weather patterns. Now home to nesting birds.

tiles.name: echoing_wind_canyon
tiles.description: A deep canyon where the wind howls incessantly, creating eerie echoes that can disorient travelers.

tiles.name: streamfed_valley_farms
tiles.description: Small farms in the valley are watered by a mountain steam. Prone to flooding after heavy rains.

tiles.name: storm_damaged_bridge
tiles.description: An old bridge, partially collapsed by a previous storm. Passable, but with extreme caution.

tiles.name: town_of_aerilon
tiles.description: The closest town of aerilon, built near the mountains to draw power and wisdom from them.

tiles.name: aerilon_farmers_market
tiles.description: In Aerilon, the farmers market offers fresh foods and alchemical ingredients.

tiles.name: aerilon_arcane_academy
tiles.description: An Academy where young mages can learn and master their magic in Aerilon.

tiles.name: aerilon_inn_the_storms_rest
tiles.description: A popular inn that provides weary travellers with a place to relax in Aerilon.

tiles.name: aerilon_town_square
tiles.description: The bustling center of Aerilon, where merchants trade and locals gather.

tiles.name: aerilon_residential_district
tiles.description: Quiet residential neighborhoods where many aerilon citizens live.

tiles.name: aerilon_watchtower_center
tiles.description: A central watchtower that protects aerilon against danger.

tiles.name: aerilon_apothecary_shop
tiles.description: A small local shop which has various magical herbs and reagents from around the region, located in Aerilon.

tiles.name: aerilon_temple_of_winds
tiles.description: A temple dedicated to the stormkings who once protected the region.

tiles.name: aerilon_gate_east
tiles.description: The east gate of Aerilon, used to connect the city to the world outside.

tiles.name: eastern_trade_route
tiles.description: A major trade route leading east from Aerilon. Many dangerous animals and monsters stalk this route.

tiles.name: overgrown_forest_trail
tiles.description: An overgrown path through a forest, now dangerous to travel through due to fallen trees and lack of use.

tiles.name: haunted_old_battlefield
tiles.description: An old battlefield where a major battle was fought long ago. It is said to be haunted by the ghosts of the fallen.

tiles.name: abandoned_farmers_village
tiles.description: A village that was abandoned due to lack of crops and resources.

tiles.name: bandit_hideout_camp
tiles.description: A camp where bandits hide out in secrecy and rob travellers.

tiles.name: isolated_fishing_pond
tiles.description: An isolated area of water perfect for finding fish if you're willing to make the hike.

tiles.name: monster_filled_caves
tiles.description: A cave system that is now filled with dangerous monsters.

tiles.name: collapsed_mine_shaft
tiles.description: An old mineshaft that has collapsed and is now inaccessible.

tiles.name: ancient_elf_rune_stones
tiles.description: Mysterious old rune stones that were placed long ago by elves.

tiles.name: secret_druid_grove
tiles.description: A secret grove hidden deep within the forest where druids can study nature and wildlife.

tiles.name: northern_mountaintop
tiles.description: The top of the range north of the Whispering Crags.

tiles.name: wind_elemental_nest
tiles.description: The nesting place for a group of wind elementals.

tiles.name: abandoned_altar_of_storms
tiles.description: A very old ruin where the ancient Stormkings would make sacrifices to the gods.

tiles.name: old_hermit_hut
tiles.description: A old small hut where a local hermit used to live, but now he is long gone.

tiles.name: monster_patrolled_trail
tiles.description: A path often patrolled by monsters, making it dangerous to travel.

tiles.name: abandoned_orc_village
tiles.description: A village that was abandoned long ago when the local orcs were driven out.

tiles.name: highlands_springs
tiles.description: Warm waters spring from this mountain source year round.

tiles.name: ancient_druid_circle
tiles.description: A place where the Druids would come to worship on the winter solstice.

tiles.name: secret_treasure_cache
tiles.description: A spot well-hidden in the mountains where old treasure used to be kept, but most of it's been robbed by now.

tiles.name: rare_metal_deposit
tiles.description: A cave deposit of rare metal once mined by the dwarves long ago.

tiles.name: aerilon_gate_west
tiles.description: The Western gate to Aerilon, often patrolled.

tiles.name: western_farming_districts
tiles.description: The local farming districts West of the City.

tiles.name: abandoned_goblin_warrens
tiles.description: A network of underground tunnels that was once home to a large group of goblins.

tiles.name: rare_mushroom_grove
tiles.description: A small part of the forest that produces rare mushrooms.

tiles.name: abandoned_wizard_tower
tiles.description: A tower abandoned after a great tragedy long ago. Said to contain valuable magical items.

tiles.name: large_oak_forest
tiles.description: A old and vast oak forest.

tiles.name: wolf_pack_territory
tiles.description: The area of the forest often prowled by a large wolf pack.

tiles.name: beehive_hive_territory
tiles.description: The domain of a hive of giant bees.

tiles.name: ancient_fort_ruins
tiles.description: Remains of an old mountain fort.

tiles.name: dangerous_cliffside_path
tiles.description: An old, dangerous path that runs along a cliff.

tiles.name: aerilon_residential_estates
tiles.description: The home of the wealthy merchants of Aerilon.

tiles.name: aerilon_town_hall
tiles.description: The main government building for Aerilon.

tiles.name: aerilon_mages_guild
tiles.description: A guild that houses many of the local mages in Aerilon.

tiles.name: aerilon_old_town
tiles.description: The oldest parts of Aerilon, featuring run-down buildings and cobblestone streets.

tiles.name: monster_attacked_caravan
tiles.description: The remains of a merchant caravan that was attacked by monsters.

tiles.name: aerilon_northern_barracks
tiles.description: The city barracks to the north, where soldiers are trained.

tiles.name: northern_watch_tower
tiles.description: A northern guard tower that overlooks the mountain pass.

tiles.name: long_forgotten_graveyard
tiles.description: An old graveyard that is no longer maintained.

tiles.name: storm_scarred_hills
tiles.description: Hills that show signs of frequent lightning and storms.

tiles.name: mountain_spring_trail
tiles.description: A trail leading to a clear mountain spring.

tiles.name: aerilon_docks_area
tiles.description: The part of the river docks located near the town center.

tiles.name: aerilon_trading_company
tiles.description: A trading company office near the docks that exports and imports goods to the town.

tiles.name: aerilon_fishermens_guild
tiles.description: A guild of fishermen working on the river.

tiles.name: aerilon_boatwright_shop
tiles.description: A shop where skilled craftsmen repair boats, or make new ones.

tiles.name: aerilon_river_crossing
tiles.description: A shallow river crossing that serves as a quick route across the water.

tiles.name: shipwreck_remnants
tiles.description: Debris from an old ship that washed up.

tiles.name: swampy_lowlands
tiles.description: The lands near the river are swampy from the heavy rainfall.

tiles.name: dangerous_crocodile_territory
tiles.description: The swamp is home to a large crocodile population.

tiles.name: bandit_lumber_camp
tiles.description: The town's supply of wood is constantly stolen by a bandit lumber camp.

tiles.name: aerilon_southern_gate
tiles.description: A large gate that leads south from Aerilon.

tiles.name: southern_farmlands
tiles.description: Vast, open farmland where Aerilon harvests much of its food.

tiles.name: aerilon_grain_mills
tiles.description: Mills near the farmlands that process the towns supply of grain.

tiles.name: ruined_temple_of_the_fields
tiles.description: A monument to agriculture lost in the sands of time.

tiles.name: old_scarecrow_field
tiles.description: Fields populated only by old and broken scarecrows.

tiles.name: deserted_farmhouse
tiles.description: A farmhouse where the residents vanished without a trace.

tiles.name: farming_supply_store
tiles.description: A shop to supply the area farmers with tools.

tiles.name: farming_guild
tiles.description: An organization where all the town's farmers meet.

tiles.name: harvest_storage_barns
tiles.description: Large barns used to store the autumn harvest.

tiles.name: trade_route_marker
tiles.description: A marker that guides merchants on a trail through the countryside.

tiles.name: plowed_fields
tiles.description: Massive tracts of land that is plowed in preparation for planting.
